features: Three 16.9 fl oz bottle of Parodontax Active Gum Health Mouthwash, Antiplaque and Antigingivitis Mouthwash, Mint
Alcohol-free mouthwash formulated with Cetylpyridinium Chloride (CPC) is designed to target plaque bacteria (1)
Antibacterial mouthwash that kills 99.9 percent of plaque bacteria (1)
Oral rinse forms an antibacterial shield that helps prevent plaque bacteria build-up to help prevent bleeding gums (1)

For best results, use this Parodontax mouthwash daily
body.description: Enhance your gum care routine and help take control over bleeding gums with Parodontax Active Gum Health Mouthwash. Designed for people with bleeding gums and free from alcohol and formulated with Cetylpyridinium Chloride (CPC), this oral rinse is designed to kill 99.9 percent of plaque bacteria (1) that builds up along the gum line, one of the main causes of bleeding gums. With daily use, this mouth rinse forms an antibacterial shield (1) that helps prevent the build-up of plaque bacteria to help take back your gum health. This antiplaque and antigingivitis mouthwash comes with a mint flavor to help keep your mouth fresh and clean. For best results, rinse with this antibacterial mouthwash daily after brushing your teeth. For healthy gums and teeth, enhance your dental care routine with Parodontax, the experts in healthy gums. (1) Bacteria associated with gingivitis in a laboratory test

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to swish for 30 seconds
reviews.reviewText: I also purchased a different brand that includes hydrogen peroxide in its mouthwash ingredients. Their mouthwash feels like a million tiny razor blades on my gums. And I'm not sure that long-term oral use of hydrogen peroxide is a good thing.This Paradontax is much easier to use. No peroxide. No razor blades.Maintaining oral hygiene is not my favorite thing. But after a couple of weeks of using Parodontax, I just flossed, brushed, and there was no blood. Sometimes I remember to swish twice a day, as the instructions say. It all cuts into my sleep time. Hard to persevere.By the way, the mint flavor is not overwhelming. It's ok.----2½ months after my first 3-pack...I'm back to buy another 3-pack. The colorless "Clean Mint" isn't available today. One thing that sold me on the colorless version was it has no unnecessary coloring ingredients. The blue "Mint" is available, and one reviewer says "the blue one is better." Who am I to argue; I'll get a 3-pack of the blue "Mint." I hope the blue coloring doesn't give me cancer in 30 years, just in case democracy and Planet Earth will be here in 30 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband has really bad gums and need a lot of work. He even had swelling, bleeding and pain when chewing. His mouth would be in so much pain, he stopped eating regular foods. Within a week of using this mouthwash and toothpaste (3x day), the bleeding stopped, the swelling significantly reduced and he is back eating all the things he loves. This is truly miracle working mouthwash and toothpaste. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! ...note the blue is better than the clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good breath destroyer
reviews.reviewText: Rinsing with this mouthwash, once, or twice a day, has eliminated my bed breath. But I need to keep rinsing periodically to keep it gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First time use
reviews.reviewText: Fresh taste, will see how well it works at next dental visit. 6 month out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best mouthwash. I use it every night after brushing. Leaves my mouth feeling very clean. Doesn’t burn like some other mouthwash. Good price for the 3 pack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, solid deal
reviews.reviewText: My wife uses it for gum issues.This is an amazing deal. I just paid $12.40 for 1 16.9 Oz bottle.This is 3 for same price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite new mouthwash!
reviews.reviewText: Used to use listerine but the taste was too strong made we want to rinse my mouth immediately.This one tastes great and no alcohol 👍 my mouth feels healthier. Definitely a keeper.

reviews.reviewText: Refreshing, and long lasting. Use with toothpaste to expedite healing process!!!!
